amount.description: Payment amount paid (to a farmer or recipient company)

amountPaidToTheCollector.description: Payment amount paid to the collector

formalCreationTime.description: Formal creation date (for example: date on receipt)

recipientUserCustomer.description: User customer that receives the payment (farmer)

representativeOfRecipientUserCustomer.description: Representative of the user customer that receives the payment (collector)

stockOrder.description: Stock order related to the payment

coordinates.description: The list of coordinates of the plot

organicStartOfTransition.description: Date of transitioning into organic production

size.description: The total size of the plot

unit.description: The unit in which the size of the plot is expressed

production.description: production description - Briefly describe your production process

estimatedOutputQuantityPerUnit.description: The estimated output quantity per unit for this processing action

finalProductAction.description: Denoting if this processing action is Transfer or Quote of a Final product

maxOutputWeight.description: Processing action maximum output weight when repacked outputs for final product is set to 'true'

publicTimelineIconType.description: Processing action public timeline icon type

qrCodeForFinalProduct.description: The Final product for which the QR code tag will be generated (used with action type GENERATE_QR_CODE)

repackedOutputFinalProducts.description: Processing action repacked outputs when using output final product

sortOrder.description: Sort order number. Lower number means first

supportedFacilities.description: List of facilities where this processing starts

valueChains.description: List of value chains for this processing action

maxOutputWeight.description: Maximum output weight when repacked outputs

repackedOutput.description: Repacked outputs of this output semi-product

requiredOnQuote.description: Processing evidence field required on quote

fairness.description: if evidence is of fairness type

provenance.description: if evidence is of provenance type

quality.description: if evidence is of quality type

requiredOnQuote.description: whether the evidence is required on quote

requiredOneOfGroupIdForQuote.description: a group in which at least one document has to be provided

creationTimestamp.description: Timestamp indicates when processing order have been created

photo.description: high-resolution photo of the product (jpeg, jpg, png), 72dpi and 1200x2000px recommended

status.description: Product label status

authCountries.description: number of authenticity checks per country

authLocations.description: number of authenticity checks per lat:lon

originCountries.description: number of origin checks per country

originLocations.description: number of origin checks per lat:lon

status.description: Product label status

photo.description: high-resolution photo of the product (jpeg, jpg, png), 72dpi and 1200x2000px recommended

productName.description: The product name of label for which the feedback was provided

status.description: Product label status
Product label status

checkAuthenticityCount.description: Number of true 'checkAuthenticity' fields over all of batches

status.description: Product label status

traceOriginCount.description: Number of true 'traceOrigin' fields over all of batches

customer.description: The company customer for whom this order is placed

deliveryDeadline.description: The delivery deadline of this order

facility.description: Facility to which this order is order is ordered

items.description: The ordered items(final products) of this order

orderId.description: The order ID entered by the user

updateTimestamp.description: Timestamp indicates when product order have been updated

text.description: origin - text and quantity input - Briefly describe where the product or its ingredients are produced

creatorId.description: ID of the user who has created the stock order

representativeOfProducerUserCustomer.description: Representative of producer user customer. E.g. collector.

updateTimestamp.description: Timestamp indicates when purchase order have been updated

updatedBy.description: User that has last updated PurchaseOrder

producerUserCustomer.description: Id of the person who has produced the entry.

certificates.description: List of certificates of the participating companies in this Stock order

cuppingScore.description: The cupping score entered during one of the processing actions

orderId.description: The global (product) order of the Stock order

laborPolicies.description: labor policies - Briefly describe labor policies you have in place in your company

consumerCompanyCustomer.description: The company customer for whom the stock order is created

creationTimestamp.description: Timestamp indicates when stock order have been created

creatorId.description: ID of the user who has created the stock order

currencyForEndCustomer.description: Currency for price per unit for end customer

lotPrefix.description: The prefix for the LOT name - retrieved from the Processing action

orderId.description: User entered Order ID when placing Quote order

otherEvidenceDocuments.description: Other processing evidence documents - evidence types that can be provided but are not mandatory

outQuantityNotInRange.description: Total quantity of this stock order is not within the expected range

priceDeterminedLater.description: Option to determine price later after taking delivery

pricePerUnitForEndCustomer.description: Price per unit for end customer

processingOrder.description: The processing order that created this stock order

producerUserCustomer.description: Id of the person who has produced the entry.

productOrder.description: The produrct order that triggered creation of this stock order

qrCodeTag.description: Generated UUID tag for this stock order QR code

qrCodeTagFinalProduct.description: The final product for which the QR code tag is generated

repackedOriginStockOrderId.description: The ID from which this repacked stock order was created; This ID is generated and provided by the client; Only applicable for repacked stock orders

representativeOfProducerUserCustomer.description: Representative of producer user customer. E.g. collector.

requiredEvidenceFieldValues.description: Processing evidence fields stored values for this stock order

requiredEvidenceTypeValues.description: Processing evidence types stored values for this stock order

updateTimestamp.description: Timestamp indicates when stock order have been updated

updatedBy.description: User that has last updated StockOrder

evidenceFieldId.description: The id of the Processing evidence field from the codebook

evidenceFieldName.description: The field name of the Processing evidence field from the codebook

evidenceFieldType.description: The data type oof the Processing evidence field from the codebook

date.description: The date of the document upload

document.description: The attached document reference of the processing evidence

evidenceTypeCode.description: The field code of the Processing evidence type from the codebook

evidenceTypeId.description: The id of the Processing evidence type from the codebook

evidenceTypeLabel.description: The field label of the Processing evidence type from the codebook

processingOrder.description: The Processing order for which the history is requested

stockOrder.description: The Stock order for which the history is requested

otherEvidenceDocuments.description: Other processing evidence documents - evidence types that can be provided but are not mandatory

processingOrder.description: The Processing order representing this processing step (used when not Purchase order)

requiredEvidenceDocuments.description: Processing evidence types stored values for this stock order

stockOrder.description: Stock order representing this processing step (used in Purchase orders)

co2Footprint.description: CO2 footprint - If you have calculated your company CO2 footprint, please add this information

packaging.description: sustainable packaging - Describe the environmental sustainability of your packaging, max 1000 chars

company.description: Company that is part of the transaction

status.description: Transaction status
Status
Status

plots.description: Plots in possession of the user customer (only applicable for type FARMER)

numberOfFarmers.description: number of farmers at this location

companyIdsAdmin.description: User's company ids where user is company admin

status.description: Status

measureUnitTypes.description: list of supported measuring unit types

processingEvidenceFields.description: list of supported processing evidence fields

processingEvidenceTypes.description: list of supported processing evidence types
